channel.title: gin on Strategineer
channel.description: Recent content in gin on Strategineer

item.title: Gin-Gin Mule
item.description: Recipe for homemade ginger beer This cocktail specifically tastes best with Tanquery gin, although feel free to use whatever you have.

item.title: Green Man's Whiskers
item.description: This is a variation on the “curled” Satan’s Whiskers cocktail which replaces the orange curaçao with blue curaçao because that’s what I had at the time.

item.title: Gimlet
item.description: You can make your own homemade lime juice cordial with this recipe Make sure to only zest the green skin of the limes. You don’t want any of the white stuff in your cordial.
